#summary DWScript Enumerations.

== Enumerations ==

Enumerations are supported, with or without explicit values.

{{{
type TMyEnumeration = (firstEnum, secondEnum, thirdEnum);
type TMyExplicitEnum = (eeOne = 1, eeTwo = 3, eeFive = 5);
}}}

An enumeration element can be referred directly (_eeOne_) or prefixed with the enumeration type (_TMyExplicitEnum.eeOne_).
